sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>circumference</radical> radical and the <kanji>circumference</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: Practice how to measure the <kanji>circumference</kanji> of an item by using your <reading>shoe</reading> (<ja>しゅう</ja>). Your shoe is kind of round, and it's free. I mean it's right there on your foot.
readingInfo: Try to find the circumference of your shoe and then email us with the measurement. I promise you'll never forget this kanji if you actually do it.
